verses.roman:
ei lāgi' puchilena brāhmaṇera sthāne
brāhmaṇa kahila saba bhoga-vivaraṇe

synonyms: ei lāgi'-for this matter; puchilena—he inquired; brāhmaṇera sthāne—from the brāhmaṇa; brāhmaṇa—the priest; kahila—informed; saba—everything; bhoga—foods; vivaraṇe—in description.
translation: When the brāhmaṇa priest was questioned about this matter, he explained in detail what kinds of food were offered to the Deity of Gopīnātha.
